website_summaries.verdict: An unscented baby powder without any potentially irritating ingredients.
pros: Free of talc, grain, and synthetics
Keeps your skin dry without any irritating ingredients
cons: Most expensive product on this list

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This powder truly is amazing and I am so very grateful that I thought to LOOK for something and try it. Being that it is talc free, grain free, corn free.....and NOTHING in it that would feed fungus....I have been able to take an issue that I have had for three months and put it to rest (even feeling oh so much better in just ONE day). Obviously, the issue doesn't go away that fast, but I am on day five and am nearly back to normal. Normal skin tone and all....without the pricklies. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: sheer luck

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was allergic to something in this powder. It was great other than my skin swelling because of the allergy. If you have sensitive skin, be aware to stop if you have an allergic reaction because it took me a few days to realize this new powder was the culprit for my skin irritation. I have not used it for 2 days now and my skin still has not totally recovered.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: smells like absolutely nothing
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has cancer, my nose has the "platinum based chemo" scents-itivity. So many things that say "fragrance free" have a smell of some kind. This, I promise you, smells like absolutely nothing. It does not have talc, which causes lung cancer, or corn starch, which feeds fungus... just a whole lot of sweat absorbing stuff. It is a bit grainy, but not a problem. I might buy it again, but a little goes a long way, so it might be a while!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An answer to a real concern. This is a wonderful, healthy product.
customer_reviews.text: The powder is so soft and fragrance free. What a relief to not have lungs full of talc powder. I just became aware of the dangers of talc which is the reason I searched for a non talc powder. I am so satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie James

customer_reviews.title: Five stars! No talc, no scent, not grainy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband & my favorite powder. We both have very sensitive skin & have never had a reaction to it. *Love* the fact that it's talc-free! Even our cat comes upstairs each nt to roll in a few shakes of it! Sure wish it was avail. in bigger containers. No scent at all, very mild, does the job of keeping us comfy. Not grainy, either. Love supporting small business!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: SO TINY
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected it to be an average size container. But this is just so tiny. I’m super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies with yeast diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking for a powder to keep my baby son dry and this one is perfect. Cornstarch isn’t appropriate for yeast rashes but I couldn’t find a powder that was talc AND cornstarch free. This one is perfect! Keeps him dry which keeps the yeast at bay. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Austen

customer_reviews.title: Add your own scent for the perfect powder
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this came unscented. I added a few drops of my favorite essential oil to make it exactly the scent I wanted. I will be ordering more of this perfect after bath powder. The formulation works really well at absorbing moisture also.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fillmore

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful powder.
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder! It has a nice light feel and does not have any fragrance (I bought fragrance-free since I have sensitive skin). Also this powder does not "fly around in the air" like other baby powders. What a relief not to breathe it in. So glad I went on to Amazon to find an unscented powder. This product is even better than expected. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I use because I want a natural option for my twin infant daughters, but I don’t like that it is a brown residue The next day when I wipe off or wash off. And it pretty spending considering the amount you get
customer_reviews.author: MissDMP

customer_reviews.title: Scent Free!
customer_reviews.text: I now Use this powder as part of my scent free regimen to prepare for deer hunting after my shower, Used to use Scent-Away talc but it's gotten so expensive. I dry off and sprinkle this powder on me in areas where I'll more likely to perspire in early bow season when it is very warm. Haven't been busted once, but of course I hunt the wind carefully as well.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling On

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and will continue to buy it. It literally smells like nothing, which is what I wanted for my fragrance sensitive nose!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Have sensitive skin, then this powder is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this powder. It is smooth, goes on easily, has staying power and not clumpy at all after sweating. Both my disabled adult son and myself use it twice daily (or more for him) and cant say enough great things about it. It is NOT SCENTED, which is just what I wanted. It is so soft and nice on the skin. It is GREAT for someone with sensitive skin. You should BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: This product works well...however it is very expensive for what you get. The container/cylinder is about 5 inches X 2 inches wide (approx) From this, the powder is only 60% full.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: I like that there is no talc in this powder
customer_reviews.text: This is baby powder but it is used by an adult. I like that there is no talc in this powder. There have been so many warnings on TV lately about talc causing cancer in women. Also I had to have a product with no scent and this is it. It has a silky feeling. I am glad I ordered two.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to the swamplands of TN so powder I was in need of something to soak up the dampness that was ever present on my body. It seems to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Sharis

customer_reviews.title: Good powder
customer_reviews.text: But container is not user friendly and it spills out constantly
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Unscented
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to find an unscented product that I can use. Synthetic scent makes me blister and this is unscented. I use it for heat rash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once and done
customer_reviews.text: Developed a rash within a few minutes of my first use!
customer_reviews.author: Bets

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It is silky soft. Truly unscented. Why only 4*s? It's just really expensive. I think I might start making my own.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Great to dry out diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the creams make diaper rashes worse. That was the case for our daughter. The powders help dry it out and help it go away for good. I love that I have peace of mind knowing this is talc free, organic and has good ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Unscented! Great for diaper area...and for getting sand off of babies at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard I'm not supposed to use powders on my baby (for health reasons...bad for lungs?). But I use this carefully and make sure to keep it away from her face. It's corn and talk free and completely unscented! Hot tip: bring this to the beach and use it to get sand off of a sticky baby.
customer_reviews.author: KatieRose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this with all my babies. Can't risk talc inhalation when your baby is involved. Works really well and no fragrance which I love just simple ingredients
customer_reviews.author: 2beautifulbabies

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance-Free but Course Powder Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This really has no smell, which is great. There is some texture to it like the powder is course; you can feel it most when rubbing it on barely moist skin. Still, I like it and will probably continue to use it. The powder sometimes comes out in a huge amount and sometimes not at all. I have yet to figure out what's going on there.
customer_reviews.author: Stanford Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Unscented version.
customer_reviews.text: The unscented version has virtually no smell. You have to put the powder right up to your nose to detect anything. When you smell it, you will wonder if it has any. Most of the times i smelled nothing at all. I'm extremely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: orbyman72

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really liking this. No fragrance which is a must. Little heavier than Johnson and Johnson so don't get that cloud you inhale which is nice. No talc, which was huge selling point. Using on my 6 yr olds bum for heat rash.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This powder is great. I needed an unscented product to help with a psoriasis issue, and I’m very pleased with it. Even better that it’s gluten-free as I’m intolerant! Also it’s not too fine which would make it get in the air to inhale.
customer_reviews.author: Artzygirl

customer_reviews.title: Best out of 5 brands tried.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 5 brands of "natural" powder and this is the best. Not grainy but also does not clump...by that I mean it easily spreads across the skin with your hand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: minimalist

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really nice powder. Doesn’t have a disturbing scent. My baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Adeyemi Planche

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Don't like that the containers you pay for are only filled half full with the product
customer_reviews.author: Eliz_suz

customer_reviews.title: Non talc Baby Powder
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Quantity of powder to price makes it expensive, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was smaller than expected , however I’m able to overlook that because it’s a good product. Unscented and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a family member with medical issues. Product was ideal for him - convenient to use, non-irritating and effective. I can highly recommend this powder for anyone with skin sensitivity.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff keeps babys butt dry and even helped with the rash its great would definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.text: Seems fine but I think not worth the price given the amount in the bottle.

customer_reviews.text: Helped with my 1 month old’s heat rash. Just put it on his back and chest after a bath and it keeps him dry. No scent. Rash is gone.

customer_reviews.title: It has no talc!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy but I feel good not putting any chemicals on my body. Goes on smooth.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to everyone whom likes to keep up their ...
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo elated to have found powder that doesn't contain talc, which is potentially carcinogenic! I recommend this to everyone whom likes to keep up their hygiene and those with babies!
customer_reviews.author: atiyah s

customer_reviews.title: Powder did not irritate my skin
customer_reviews.text: Love the powder because I have sensitive skin. Very difficult to find powder without talc or corn starch in the retail stores. I like that the powder is unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought the unscented specifically to use in my hair in between washes and it works great! Love that it is talc and corn free!
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: clumps up easily but thats better than possibility of cancer from talc
customer_reviews.author: nadias

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The powder is excellent, I love that it is not only talcum free but corn starch free as well! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone searching for a safe and natural powder to use to stay dry in personal areas.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best powder out there if you’re looking to be AIP compliant inside and out!!!

customer_reviews.title: Why more money when purchased through Amazon than directly from the seller?
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Expensive and I was dismayed to see that the price on the Amazon marketplace was $2 more than if the product had been purchased directly from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Kaye

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product and it was amazing! Not one sneeze or skin reaction at all
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is allergic to most powders due to the scent added. I purchased this product and it was amazing! Not one sneeze or skin reaction at all. It's soft on the skin as well!

customer_reviews.title: I love that this is Herbal
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is Herbal, no talc. Works perfect. If you are looking for something that does not have any chemicals in it - try this one - you love it.
customer_reviews.author: thebigdog

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this organic Powder  Its the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Ora's Natural Baby Powder. Fantastic Powder. Use it daily So safe and gentle

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that is odorless! But it didn’t protect my baby skin for getting irritated. Such a waste of money because I can’t use it!!!

customer_reviews.title: it's worth buying as it works wonderful on my baby's skin
customer_reviews.text: Even though it seems expensive, it's worth buying as it works wonderful on my baby's skin... Better applying on all the skin foldings of my newborn..

customer_reviews.title: Talc Free and No Fragrance - just what I need!
customer_reviews.text: First time I have ordered anything by Ora. I have recently developed a slight allergy to fragrance and I believe the natural baby powder is going to be just what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I tried many new options after using Johnson’s baby powder for years. This was the closest to the silky feel of regular baby powder.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazingly well on my baby’s diaper rash, love it. Kinda small container but a great product inside

customer_reviews.title: which is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product frequently. I have Hidradenitis Suppurativa and this helps keep my skin dry between flairs without irritating my old wounds. As others have said, it is genuinely fragrance free, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Brown

customer_reviews.title: Powder puffery?
customer_reviews.text: This powder seems to go on a tiny bit clumpy or grainy when applied to moist areas. The effect only lasts a few seconds before it turns back into a nice uniform light powder, but it is a bit off-putting. And the price seems very high for this tiny little container. But, I wanted an unscented non-talc formula, and this seemed worth a try. Not worth returning it, but I will probably try a few others in this category as well.
customer_reviews.author: Novel Gazer

customer_reviews.title: grainy and does a poor job of absorption
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, grainy and does a poor job of absorption. There are much better non-talc options out there.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, the push in container part is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, the push in container part is a bit fiddly to get the powder out of, but other than that-no problems. I use it for waxing and I haven't noticed bad skin reactions.

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect!

Love, love Ora's Amazing Herbal!!!!!!

customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product multiple times and will continue to repurchase.

customer_reviews.title: but so far it has been fantastic. I'm using it as a dry shampoo and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, but so far it has been fantastic. I'm using it as a dry shampoo and I love that it is TRULY fragrance free and much safer to use than actual dry shampoos. You can't even see it in my jet black hair once it is rubbed in and actually helps give volume once it absorbs my natural hair oils. Also, a little goes a long way, so the price though a bit high, seems to be worth the quality.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff

customer_reviews.text: It makes me happy to know I'm doing something good for my children. This is a thicker, more grainy powder (if that makes sense) than the typical Johnson & Johnson Baby Powder. It doesn't poof up into the air when applying on a baby bottom so you're not breathing in the fine powder particles. It works just as well as other powder but without the guilt!

customer_reviews.text: The powder itself is ok but it is way overpriced. On amazon it was the only product that fit my needs but after buying this I found (on etsy) a similar product (no talc, no cornstarch) for $12.95 for 8 oz.

customer_reviews.title: Great uncscented baby powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder! It has really helped keep my baby's diaper rash at bay. And, I love that it is fragrance free. It's very hard to find baby powder that doesn't contain fragrance.

customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. The texture is fine and goes on smooth. I have extremely sensitive skin and haven't experienced any problems. It is helpful in reducing heat rash under my bra. The only drawback is price.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great. To me honestly doesn't have a smell. I mean its very faint. It also not fine. You will feel a courseness but we want that so it doesn't go in the air easily. It's not course like it will hurt but you can feel the clay consistancy. I love it knowing it's safe and working great on my lo who's 7 weeks old. I know you shouldn't put anything on a babies bum unless redness is noted but hello who doesn't feel good with a little powder. I will be continue to buy this until baby is potty trained.

So, I'm really thinking of whether I want to continue to buy this product. I'm thinking about it because of the price so it's why I gave it a four. The powder itself is very nice.

I highly recommend and will definitely order again. I know a few here found the powder to be gritty but I did not at all. Great service from seller, too. Thank you!

customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My baby gets diaper rashes like crazy and I needed to try something new. I dab some of this powder on her and then gently rub it in to make sure she's dry before putting on a barrier cream and a new diaper. Love that I don't have to worry about her health from this powder as we were told years ago not to use baby powder because of the lungs, etc.

customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and silky. Keeps you dry and comfortable all day. I will buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Meh didn't like the texture on this, also didn't work as well as regular baby powder.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but more grainy than CA baby brand and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but more grainy than CA baby brand and doesn't seem quite at effective as CA baby at getting rid of diaper rash. Unscented. Bottle doesn't leak, which is nice (CA baby leaks).
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this product 0 stars I would!!!!! Hurt my 7 week old son.
customer_reviews.text: This product started out great. I used it for a few days for my sons diaper rash and even ordered another. Well a few times my son would cry and cry after a diaper change last night I finally realized what it was. His bottom was complete white and not red until we put this powder on him. It caused a HUGE painful rash. I'm so disappointed. I don't know if they put something synthetic into this product but I would absolutely not recommend it. My son was in so much pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this powder
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this powder. I loved that it does not have a scent and it makes my skin feel dry and soft.
customer_reviews.author: SW

product_meta.title: Talc Free Baby Powder, Natural Baby Powder, Baby Powder Talc-Free, Baby Powder No Cornstarch, Unscented, Ora’s Amazing Herbal, Made in USA Baby Products
product_meta.description: Color:UnscentedBaby Powder INGREDIENTS: Kaolin Clay Powder, Sodium Bicarbonate (Baking Soda), Maranta arundinacea (Arrowroot) Powder, Plantago major (Plantain) leaf Powder. Our powders are all free of talc, grains, and anything synthetic. Talc is now known to remain airborne for an extended period of time, allowing it to get into the lungs and has also been found in other various body tissue where it doesn’t belong. We don’t like this. Corn and grain starches, a common powder ingredient, has been shown to exacerbate certain types of rashes. We don’t like this either. Our powders are all free of talc, grains, and anything synthetic. We make our unscented baby powder truly unscented because babies smell good enough all on their own. It is important to be aware that with the newborn, scent is a crucial part of the bonding experience between mother and baby. It is known to be a factor in the establishment of the breastfeeding relationship too. As challenging as the early months of infancy are, the more we learn about it, the more we see that nature got it right. We like to stay out of the way. Enjoy. Please be in touch with any suggestions, questions, or just to send us some love. We like that too! -Ora
feature_bullets: Talc Free Baby Powder. Chemical free, cornstarch and grain free. Scent free.
Keep that squishy tushy dry, soft, and fresh.
Cornstarch baby powder can cause rashes. This talc free and corn free powder absorbs moisture, balances pH and soothes irritated skin.

Some helpful facts about our Talc Free Baby Powder. The kaolin clay we use is domestic and tested to be lead free Arrowroot and organic plantain leaf are anti inflammatory ingredients. Baking soda is used to help prevent microbial growth but in a very small amount so as not to interrupt the pH of the skin.
Ora's Amazing Herbal is a woman owned and family run business. Made in the USA.
